description: Number of one-factors in Moebius ladder M_n.
references: J. P. McSorley, Counting structures in the Moebius ladder, Discrete Math., 184 (1998), 137-164.
links: Vincenzo Librandi, Table of n, a(n) for n = 0..1000
Index entries for linear recurrences with constant coefficients, signature (1,2,-1,-1).
formula: If n mod 2 = 0 then L(n) else L(n)+2, where L() are the Lucas numbers.a(n) = A001350(n) + 2.G.f.: (2+x-4*x^2-x^3)/((1+x)*(1-x)*(1-x-x^2)). [_Colin Barker_, Jan 23 2012]
prog: (MAGMA) I:=[2, 3, 3, 6]; [n le 4 select I[n] else Self(n-1)+2*Self(n-2)-Self(n-3)-Self(n-4): n in [1..40]]; // _Vincenzo Librandi_, Apr 20 2012
author: _N. J. A. Sloane_.
